description: The demolition of existing buildings on the sites of 1 Hindsleys Place and 31-51 Perry Vale SE23 and re-development of the site for residential and commercial uses, comprising a three, four and five storey building with lower ground floor, containing 260m square metres of commercial floor space (Use Classes A1/A2/A3/B1) at ground floor level and 70 apartments with balconies and roof terraces (27 one bedroom and 43 two bedroom) plus a one bedroom, two storey mews flat within the rear parking area, 19 car parking spaces, 72 bicycle spaces, an electricity sub-station and a new vehicular access from Hindsley's Place.
